postData.description: This package name is not currently in use, but was formerly occupied by a popular package. To avoid malicious use, npm is hanging on to the package name, but loosely, and we'll probably give it to you if you want it.
postData.readme:
# Security holding package

This package name is not currently in use, but was formerly occupied
by a popular package. To avoid malicious use, npm is hanging on to
the package name, but loosely, and we'll probably give it to you if
you want it.

You may adopt this package by contacting support@npmjs.com and
requesting the name.
